data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 4,980 believers in the state of Pazardzhik the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pazardzhik, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Pazardzhik, Bulgaria humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 50 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Pazardzhik, Bulgaria to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Pazardzhik.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Tatar, Crimean people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Pazardzhik, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Pazardzhik, Bulgaria to the gospel today.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Pazardzhik.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

location.name: Pazardzhik
location.people_groups_list: Albanian, Adyghe, Yoruk, Pomak, Jew, Bulgarian-speaking
